last_episode_to_air.name: Bohus and Shaun... Ride an Amphicar
last_episode_to_air.overview: After picking through a barn in Upstate New York, Shaun and Bohus head north of the border to attend a boat show in Muskoka, Ontario; they get more than they expected, including a joyride in a vintage amphibious car.

name: Vintage Tech Hunters
overview: Vintage Tech Hunters features charismatic collectors Shaun Hatton and Bohus Blahut, who have turned an obsession with retro pop culture finds into their dream jobs. The vibrant duo scours Canada and the U.S., rooting through rickety attics, dusty garages, flea markets, and auctions for rare and nostalgic treasures. From original Nintendo Game Boys and priceless first-edition computers to animatronic toys, the pair aims to uncover rare and nostalgic treasures – because to the right collector, they’re worth a fortune.

production_companies.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Go on An Odyssey
episodes.overview: On a road trip across the American Midwest, Bohus and Shaun discover a Magnavox Odyssey, the world's first commercial video game; they set out on a hunt for missing parts they need to sell the game as a complete package.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Talk to Gorgar
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun take the world's first talking pinball machine to Dallas for restoration, where they find some rare vintage tech and search for deals at a liquidation sale.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Buy a Jukebox
episodes.overview: During a road trip in Southern California, Bohus and Shaun find a vintage jukebox in need of repair and take it to Los Angeles to have it restored; in Los Angeles they hunt for vintage tech at local flea markets and an e-waste recycling facility.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Buy Space Pants
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun attend a rare space memorabilia auction in Dallas.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Race Slot Cars
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun find a vintage slot car kit at a flea market in Illinois.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Go Berserk
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun search for a vintage coin op and wind up in the Sanfilippo estate.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Put the Pedal to the Metal
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun find a rare British electric car in Ontario.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Drive a Microcar
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun stop at a 90-mile-long yard sale and a multimillion-dollar collection, which includes rare, mint-condition microcars.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Drive a Time Machine
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun search for vintage tech along the back roads of Nova Scotia.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Go to the Movies
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun search a New Jersey barn.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Collect Apples
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun find an Apple II computer and learn that it could be worth more than they realize.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Find a Higher Porpoise
episodes.overview: Bohus and Shaun travel to Ontario to get a dolphin ride restored and find some deals along the way.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Get Lit
episodes.overview: Shaun and Bohus travel to Brooklyn to have an old neon sign brought back to life; while they wait, they hunt through New York Citys trash and discover New Yorkers throw out some really cool stuff.

episodes.name: Bohus and Shaun... Ride an Amphicar
episodes.overview: After picking through a barn in Upstate New York, Shaun and Bohus head north of the border to attend a boat show in Muskoka, Ontario; they get more than they expected, including a joyride in a vintage amphibious car.
